author: rklar@thehill.com (Rebecca Klar)
title: FDA approves mask sterilization technology promoted by Trump
description: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved a sterilization system that has the capability of decontaminating desperately needed respirator masks up to 20 times. President Trump and Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine (R) had promoted the...
content:
The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved a sterilization system that has the capability of decontaminating desperately needed respirator masks up to 20 times. 
President Trump and Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine (R) had promoted the Battelle decontamination… [+3203 chars]
